info.title: Farmbox
info.description:
This document describes the first version (V1) of Farmbox's API.

## Sandbox

All requests during development can be done on the staging server (test.farmbox.cc), data changes made on this enviroment are not replicated to our production environment.
Be warned that the Staging Database can be updated/reseted frequently without further notice.

# Authentication

We support two authentication methods:

## Client Token

Authentication is done using a specific Client Token generated for each individual Client. This method
leverages a simple mechanism of authenticating on the behalf of the entire organization. This token is provided
by us and you should add as a value to the `Authorization` header on each request.

## Oauth 2 Authentication

Contact our technical support for information and credentials.

____

get.description: Lists all active plantations (plots on harvests)
Lists the results from each day monitored to each plantation
Info from a single monitoring day
Lists all cropped volumes from plantation

post.description:
Increment plantation cropped volume.

Volume will be added (sum) to the existing plantation cropped volume

get.description: Info from a single cropped volume

put.description:
Updates an existing cropped volume...
This will not affect productivity from already cropped/closed plantations

status.description: Application status, valid options: sought and finalized

new_id.description: Id of the new global variety

dosage_unit.description: Input unit, valid options: g_ha, kg_ha, ml_ha, l_ha, un_ha

formulation.description: Formulationm, valid options: liquid, solid, unity

input_type.description: Input type, valid options: insecticide, acaricide, fungicide, herbicide, adjuvant, regulator, fertilizer, inoculant, nutrition, seed, micronutrient, bactericide

input_type_id.description: Input type identifier ... use this or input_type

unit.description: Quantity unit, valid options: ml, l, g, kg, un PENDING

movimentation_type.description: Movimentation type, valid options: in, out

vegetative_action_level.description: Action threshold when plantation is on a vegetative phenological stage

vegetative_damage_level.description: Damage threshold when plantation is on a vegetative phenological stage

reproductive_action_level.description: Action threshold when plantation is on a reproductive phenological stage

reproductive_damage_level.description: Damage threshold when plantation is on a reproductive phenological stage

responsible_id.description: User identifier from the technical reponsible for the application

charge_id.description: User identifier from the charge of the application

status.description: Application status, valid options: waiting, sought, finalized

dosage_unity: l_ha.description: Dosage value unit, valid options: ml_ha, l_ha, g_ha, kg_ha, un_ha

kind.description: Operation kind, valid options: lost, removed, returned

unit.description: Quantity unit, valid options: ml, l, g, kg, un

type.description: Equipment type, valid options: air, land

description.example: Foram encontrados alguns problemas aqui na fazenda.

tags.name: Resource Update Notification
tags.description:
##  Rest Hooks

Contact our technical support for more information on how to subscribe to REST-like notifications on a 
given resource.
